Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Reroute at at Damen/53rd
ShortDescription: 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 55th, Western, 51st and Damen due to, street blockage  near Damen/53rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 55th, Western, 51st and Damen due to, street blockage  near Damen/53rd.

Allow extra travel time.
